item.title: Manual Insight B2B
item.description: Manual Insight B2B Mission Standardize Profound Manuals between Enterprises Problem Manuals often share the same essences Manual insight should be more open between businesses to achieve advantages Enhance the overall value of all businesses Solution Intelligent manual recommendation with NLP AI Link analytics with specific manual as specific proposition bring git-like collaborative manual system to the company
